reasoning: Bug fix that replaces hardcoded mock data with real API integration. Touches 2-4 files (component + API hook/service), single service (frontend), no external integrations. Requires standard React data fetching patterns that likely exist in codebase.

scope.notes: Localized to Equipment drawer component (EquipmentPage.tsx). May also touch shared API hooks/services and possibly a types file.

integrations.notes: Uses existing internal API endpoint /projects/{id}/files. No new external services or dependencies required.

infrastructure.notes: No infrastructure changes. API endpoint already exists, just need to consume it.

knowledge.notes: Standard React data fetching pattern. Need to identify existing API client patterns in codebase, but no external documentation research required.

concerns: Need to verify API response structure
File size formatting needs to match existing mock format
Project ID context availability in component
risk.notes: Medium risk due to API integration requiring proper state management. However, contained scope and existing patterns reduce risk significantly.

validation_recommendations.reasoning: API integration requires unit tests for component logic and integration tests for API fetching. No security-sensitive areas or infrastructure changes involved.
